resources:
Quiz quiz 1. Which of the following countries has agreed to accept the payment of export of oil and petroleum products to India, in rupee terms instead of dollar or any other currency? Kuwait UAE Iran Iraq
2. Which of the following countries has signed a \'Non-Aggression Pact\' with Sudan? Uganda South Sudan Ethiopia South Africa
3. The sensitive index of National Stock Exchange of India is popularly known as.... CRIS CSE MCS NIFTY //ans
4. The number of already named bones in the human skeleton is 200 206 203 208
5. Among the following which natural number has no predecessor? 100 200 1 0
6. Which among the following is the largest known number in the world? ∞ googol googolplex gram
7. In which number system, there is no symbol for zero? Hindu Arabic system Roman //ans Egyptian Egyptian
8. Rational number is represented by __________. N Z R //ans Q
9. An integer p which is not 0 or ±1 and is divisible by no integer except ±1 and itself is called: Rational number Perfect number Complex number Prime number //ans
10. A number only divisible by itself and one has inspired Joe Mac Anthony to title one of his works. What was the title of his work? Prime Target //ans The Perfect Ten The Amicable The Pythagoras
Are you ready for..
